name: bj-0nelopab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0))), wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0))
-| wi(wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0))
-| wi(wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0))))

|- wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wi(wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(emptycls, copab(s0, s1, w0))))

comment: The empty set is never an element in an ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Nov-2017.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 22-Jul-2023.) TODO: move to Main when one can reorder sections so that we can use ~ relopab (this is a very limited reordering).
